AbstractText: Since the outbreak of SARS-CoV-2, the etiologic agent of the COVID-19 pandemic, the viral genome has acquired numerous mutations with the potential to increase transmission. One year after its emergence, we now further analyze emergent SARS-CoV-2 genome sequences in an effort to understand the evolution of this virus.
